biotools.summary:
A new approach for quantifying mitochondrial genome rearrangement.

qMGR is an algorithm used to study the rearrangement of mitochondrial genomes. Using it, we can calculate rearrangement frequency of a single gene or rearrangement score of a single genome in a certain population.

1. Input a benchmark arrangement.

please choose... Typical vertebrate arrangement Typical invertebrate arrangement.

2. Input one or more mitogenome arrangements in a taxon.
